thread.title: Michael B Jordan to play Boba Fett in 'Star Wars' spin-off
thread.title_full: Michael B Jordan to play Boba Fett in 'Star Wars' spin-off - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Michael B Jordan to play Boba Fett in 'Star Wars' spin-off
text:
Lucasfilm and Walt Disney Pictures are reportedly eyeing Michael B Jordan to portray the bounty hunter, Boba Fett in "Star Wars" spin-off.
READ: â€‹ Michael B Jordan in talks to star in 'Blood Brothers'
Despite losing director Josh Trank, Lucasfilm still continues making the untitled stand-alone Star Wars film II , which centers on the origin story of Boba Fett, reported The Wrap.
Straight Outta Compton director F Gary Gray, who recently confirmed that he would helm Fast and Furious 8 , will direct the Boba Fett film.
